description: A utility for time offset and timezone calculations. Default timezone is UTC+8. Leap year (February 29) is handled internally.

input.timezone: Integer, optional, default 8. The target timezone offset relative to UTC.
input.Y: Integer, year offset. Can be positive or negative.
input.M: Integer, month offset. Can be positive or negative.
input.D: Integer, day offset. Can be positive or negative.
input.h: Integer, hour offset. Can be positive or negative.
input.m: Integer, minute offset. Can be positive or negative.
input.s: Integer, second offset. Can be positive or negative.
